name: array-map
description: Extract a field from each item in an array

input.description: Object containing an array field with items to extract from

field.description: Field name to extract from each array item

array.description: Name of the array field in the input object (defaults to 'items')

output.description: Array of extracted values from the specified field of each item

examples.description: Extract names from array of objects
Extract ages from array of objects
Extract from custom array field name
